name: The Apadana Palace
description:
believe in you.
You are the symbol of human endeavor to build.
I’m sure we will rebuild you for happiness, for glories, for greatness, for humanity, for everything’s that you and us deserved.
I’m certain that days will come soon.

The Apadana Palace
The third NFT of Persepolis NFTs collection.
Reconstruction of Apadana Palace in Persepolis 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿
It was built by the founder of Persepolis "Darius the Great" in 550 BC in Persia.
